item.title: First Ether ETF Filed With the SEC is Not Offering Insurance
item.description:
First Ether ETF Filed With the SEC is Not Offering Insurance

As competition heats up amongst Bitcoin ETF providers SolidX and the Winklevoss Twins, another contender emerged to establish an exchange-traded fund based on a digital currency. Recently found company called EtherIndex LLC officially filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on July 15 to offer the public and conventional investors opportunities to invest in Ether, the underlying currency of smart contract-based decentralized platform known as Ethereum.

item.title: Support Digital Currencies, Blockchain & Fintech, US Congress Tells Govt
item.description:
Support Digital Currencies, Blockchain & Fintech, US Congress Tells Govt

With a new bipartisan bill by the House of Representatives, a call has been issued to the US Government to adopt a national policy to promote citizens' access to new financial innovation including blockchain and digital currencies.

item.title: Bitcoin Scam Site Alert - HashBX
item.description:
Bitcoin Scam Site Alert - HashBX

For those bitcoin users who have ever wanted to purchase "the powers" of cloud mining, HashBX might be the company for you. That is, assuming you don't mind taking a significant risk with the potential for losing all of your money shortly. This is yet another cloud mining company with zero evidence of them owning any hashpower whatsoever.

item.title: The Central Bankers' Bold New Idea: Print Bitcoins
item.description:
The Central Bankers' Bold New Idea: Print Bitcoins

When it comes to bitcoin and digital currencies, central banks might be considering the adage: "If you can't beat them, join them." In a research paper published on Monday, economists at the Bank of England advocated that central banks issue their own kind of digital currency. Using the U.S.

item.title: Brazil's Bitcoin Trade Grows Exceeding Gold, Its Banks Test Out Blockchain
item.description:
Brazil's Bitcoin Trade Grows Exceeding Gold, Its Banks Test Out Blockchain

Over the first six months of 2016, Bitcoin trading volumes in Brazil surpassed that of gold on the Brazilian Securities, Commodities, and Futures Exchange by around 7 percent. While gold has a track record that shouldn't be underestimated, it also can't be ignored that Bitcoin exceeding that of gold is seen as an historic moment given the fact that it has only be trading for seven years.

item.title: BitID Will Verify Your Identity with the Bitcoin Blockchain
item.description:
BitID Will Verify Your Identity with the Bitcoin Blockchain

A new protocol called "BitID" promises to streamline identity verification for online services while protecting privacy - with tokens on the Bitcoin blockchain. Also read: JPMorgan: Blockchain is the Real Deal, Get Off the Sidelines BitID is now concluding a successful testing period, and should be ready for other services to use in the near future.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Consolidation Pushes And Pulls
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Consolidation Pushes And Pulls

Bitcoin price has pulled lower into its consolidation zone. Although today has potentially bearish bias due to a full moon, there are indications and parameters that could see the advance pick up its pace. This analysis is provided by xbt.social with a 3-hour delay. Read the full analysis here.

item.title: Russia's Ministry of Finance Now Intends to Allow Citizens to Buy and Sell Bitcoin Abroad - CoinDesk
item.description:
Russia's Ministry of Finance Now Intends to Allow Citizens to Buy and Sell Bitcoin Abroad - CoinDesk

An official from Russia's Ministry of Finance has indicated the financial regulator now supports changes to a proposed law that would ban bitcoin domestically but carve out provisions for its use as a foreign currency.

item.title: Russia to Treat Bitcoin as Foreign Currency and Enable Trading
item.description:
Russia to Treat Bitcoin as Foreign Currency and Enable Trading

Nearly a week after the proposal of Party of Growth-a political party in Russia which represents the liberal free market economy-to legalize bitcoin, the Russian Ministry of Finance and the country's lawmakers are set to treat cryptocurrencies including bitcoin as a foreign currency.

item.title: Bitcoin Price Watch; Trading The Asian Session - NEWSBTC
item.description:
Bitcoin Price Watch; Trading The Asian Session - NEWSBTC

Here's a look at what we are focusing on in the bitcoin price this evening. The session has now drawn to a close in Europe, and it's time to take a look at how action played out today in the bitcoin price.
